description:
Art imitates our love for the mountains in these Ski Zero Cushion Chasing Mountains Print Over the Calf Socks. Feel all-day comfort in a one-of-a-kind sock designed by Vernan Kee, in collaboration with Natives Outdoors to empower Indigenous communities. With breathability, durability, and a performance-ready fit, this sock has everything you need to keep chasing mountains again and again…and again.

  • Vernan Kee designs by Smartwool®, brought together in collaboration with Natives Outdoors to empower Indigenous communities
  • Indestructawool™ technology with extended durability zones
  • 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit
  • Shred Shield™ technology reduces wear from toes
  • Wider welt for secure fit and comfort
  • Body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability
name: Smartwool Ski Zero Chasing Mountains OTC Socks - Unisex
